xmlquery.searchDeviceTrx: Select a.idDevice as idDevice, a.idValueType as idValueType, d.idSite as idSite, a.value as value, b.nmValueType as nmValueType, d.nmSite as nmSite, a.updatedTime from smiot_device_trx a inner join smiot_value_type b inner join smiot_device c inner join smhris_site d on a.idValueType = b.idValueType and a.idDevice = c.idDevice and c.idSite = d.idSite order by a.updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceTrxByIdSite: Select a.idDevice as idDevice, a.idValueType as idValueType, d.idSite as idSite, a.value as value, b.nmValueType as nmValueType, d.nmSite as nmSite, a.updatedTime from smiot_device_trx a inner join smiot_value_type b inner join smiot_device c inner join smhris_site d on a.idValueType = b.idValueType and a.idDevice = c.idDevice and c.idSite = d.idSite where d.idSite = ? order by a.updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceTrxByAnyLike: Select *, b.nmValueType as nmValueType, d.nmSite as nmSite, a.updatedTime from smiot_device_trx a inner join smiot_value_type b inner join smiot_device c inner join smhris_site d on a.idValueType = b.idValueType and a.idDevice = c.idDevice and c.idSite = d.idSite where a.idDevice like ? or a.idValueType like ? or a.idSite like ?
